text: The water leakage in my bathroom hasn't been fixed for 3 days. I'm really frustrated.
My rent payment was deducted twice this month. Please refund the extra amount.
The security staff is very polite, but the lift is frequently not working.
There is loud noise from the neighbours every night past 11 PM. It's affecting my sleep.
The maintenance team was very quick in resolving my AC issue. Really appreciate it!
Common areas are not cleaned regularly. The corridors look dirty most of the time.
Internet in my flat is very slow and keeps disconnecting during my work calls.
I love the garden area and kids' play zone. My children really enjoy it here.
Parking management is chaotic. People often park in my allotted spot.
I raised a ticket for my broken window but no one has visited yet. This is disappointing.
